Class UserSession

java.lang.Object
  org.tal.redstonechips.user.UserSession

public class UserSession
extends Object

Manages player specific data.

Tal Eisenberg

public void setSelection(List<Circuit> selection)
Replaces any selected circuits with a new selection list.

public UserSession.Mode getMode()
Returns:
Current player operation mode.

setMode

public void setMode(UserSession.Mode m)
Parameters:
m - Sets player operation mode.

playerQuit

public void playerQuit()
Called when the player tied to this session quits the server. Player data is saved to file.

playerJoined

public void playerJoined(org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
Called when the session player joins the server. Player data is loaded from its player file if it exists.

Parameters:
p - The new Player object of the session player.

useToolInHand

public boolean useToolInHand(org.bukkit.block.Block block)
Uses the tool in the player's hand on the specified Block.

Parameters:
block - used Block.
Returns:
true if a Tool was used.

selectChip

public void selectChip(Circuit c)
Adds or removes a Circuit from the chip selection and notifies the player.

Parameters:
c - a Circuit.

clearCuboid

public void clearCuboid()
Clears the session cuboid and returns to Mode.NORMAL if the player was defining a cuboid.

setCuboid

public void setCuboid(org.bukkit.Location[] cuboid)
Sets the session cuboid.

Parameters:
cuboid - Location array of two opposite cuboid corners.

getCuboid

public org.bukkit.Location[] getCuboid()
Returns:
The players WorldEdit selection cuboid if defined, the session cuboid if defined or null.

defineCuboid

public void defineCuboid()
Switch to Mode.CUBOID_DEFINE mode.

addCuboidLocation

public void addCuboidLocation(org.bukkit.Location location)
Adds a cuboid corner location. When the cuboid has two locations it's set as the session cuboid and all chips inside it are added to the selection. the selection is cleared of any other chips.

Parameters:
location - a Location.

selectChipsInCuboid

public void selectChipsInCuboid(org.bukkit.Location[] sel,
                                boolean add)
Select all chips inside a cuboid region.

Parameters:
sel - an array with two opposite corner Locations of the cuboid.
add - When true chips are added to the current selection, otherwise the previous selection is cleared.

findChipsInCuboid

public static List<Circuit> findChipsInCuboid(org.bukkit.Location[] cuboid,
                                              RedstoneChips rc)
Parameters:
cuboid - an array with two opposite corner Locations of the cuboid.
rc - Plugin reference.
Returns:
a List of all Circuits found inside the cuboid.

getDebugger

public Debugger getDebugger()
Returns:
This session's debugger.

setDebugger

public void setDebugger(Debugger d)
Sets the session debugger.

Parameters:
d - a Debugger.

putPlayerData

public void putPlayerData(String key,
                          Object data)
Adds custom persistent player data. Player data is saved when the player quits and reloaded when he rejoins the server.

Parameters:
key - Map key.
data -

getPlayerData

public Object getPlayerData(String key)
Parameters:
key - Map key.
Returns:
Player data for this key or null.

save

public void save()
          throws IOException
Save all session data to file. This currently includes tools settings and custom player data.

Throws:
IOException

load

public void load()
          throws InstantiationException,
                 IllegalAccessException,
                 ClassNotFoundException
Loads session data from file.

Throws:
InstantiationException - When a tool can't be reconstructed.
IllegalAccessException - When a tool can't be reconstructed.
ClassNotFoundException - When a tool can't be reconstructed.

getPlayerFile

public File getPlayerFile()
Returns:
the File that this session saves data to.

                                    File folder)
Parameters:
name - a player name.
folder - Where player files are stored.
Returns:
The session file for this player name.

                                    File folder)
Parameters:
p - a Player.

Returns:
The session file for this Player.
